NCCS_CLINICAL_TEXT:
Patient admitted with slurred speech right sided weakness and confusion Elderly care 
consultant documents CVA in the medical record and sends patient for MRI scan of the 
brain Diagnosis documented on the MRI report by the consultant radiologist states: Middle 
cerebral artery subarachnoid haemorrhage
NCCS_PRIM_DIAG_DESC: Subarachnoid haemorrhage from middle cerebral artery

NCCS_CLINICAL_TEXT: Patient admitted for treatment of a diabetic cataract the patient has type 1 diabetes mellitus

NCCS_SEC_DIAG_DESC: Type 1 diabetes mellitus with ophthalmic complications
